locations.name: Bahen 1F
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East. You see something shiny on the ground -- looks like a toonie?
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. One student is rushing down the corridor, wearing a heavy-looking backpack and carrying a textbook in their arms. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.

locations.name: Robarts Library 1st Floor
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of Robarts Library.

locations.name: Dorm
locations.brief_description: You are in your dorm, waking up in panic.
locations.long_description: exit dorm to go to the second floor

locations.name: 2nd Floor Aisle
locations.long_description: go west is taking the elevator, enter dorm is technically going east

locations.name: Morison Hall Entrance
locations.long_description: exit building to st. george street middle, go east is taking the elevator back up

items.name: usb drive
items.description: A small USB drive containing the only copy of your game. Losing this would be catastrophic.

items.name: laptop charger
items.description: Your laptop charger, desperately needed with your battery hovering at 5%.

items.name: lucky u of t mug
items.description: Your beloved University of Toronto mug. Itâ€™s chipped, sentimental, and absolutely irreplaceable.

items.name: t-card
items.description: Student card, it helps you access rooms in Bahen and Robarts
